duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to increase digital awareness, showcase value, and enhance industry credibility.
Lead the management of social media channels and online communities to support content specialist and increase engagement.
Analyze and manage key analytics across digital platforms and prepare regular reporting for leadership.
Compile and distribute company-wide and expert network email newsletters.
Identify and share applicable real-time social media trends to amplify the message and value proposition.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
